TEXT.TITLE: <FRANKLIN OPTION FUND> SETS DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Qtly dividend 23 cts vs 21.6 cts in prior qtr Payable July 14 Record July one Dividend includes short-term capital gain of 20 cts vs 16 cts short-term and 2.2 cts long-term gains in prior quarter Reuter
